text:
Wilmington, DE - Philadelphia, PA - Or Boston, MA

https://careers-sevone.icims.com/jobs/1431/sr.-platform-scal...

SevOne is looking for badass Software/Systems Architects to help us in the development of highly distributed platform used by some of the largest companies in the world to monitor their infrastructure and networks.

Stack: C/C++ on Linux, MySQL, PHP, JavaScript, HTML, CSS.

Apply to the link above, or email bkennedy@sevone.com
